summary: A retexture of the Frost Troll to help it fit in a little better with it\'s chilly surroundings.
descriptionHtml:
An excerpt from the latest Troll Slaying Annual:

The Frost Troll (Trollus Chillum) is native to Skyrim, and can be found frolicking in the snow and dismembering unlucky townsfolk and adventurers alike. Not much is known of its migratory or mating rituals, but for the new creature observer, a recommended safe distance for watching is 1084 septims (thank you to Horik from Dawnstar for that contribution - many of us here wonder how you managed that feat while surviving to share it). 
------------
This is a retexture of the Frost Troll to help it fit in a little better with its snowy surroundings. Refer to the before/after photo for the difference.

HOW TO INSTALL
Extract the archive to your Data folder (overwrite if prompted).

HOW TO UNINSTALL
Delete \'troll.dds\' and \'troll_n.dds\' from your \'Data\\textures\\actors\\troll\' folder

SHAMELESS PLUG
If you like this one, you might like my Snow Falmer mod (http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4432).
author: spiffy jim
